Literature.Title: Small Peptides Derived from Penetratin as Antibacterial Agents.
Literature.Author: Parravicini O, Somlai C, Andujar SA, Garro AD, Lima B, Tapia A, Feresin G, Perczel A, Tóth GK, Cascales JL, Rodríguez AM, Enriz RD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=5-6.25µg/ml),Yersinia enterocolitica(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Salmonella sp.(MIC=5µg/ml)
